portfolio.description:
Portfolio of professional and academic projects
Complete collection of my achievements: responsive website development, interactive applications, collaborative projects. Each project demonstrates my technical progression, adaptability and methodological approach to development. Structured code, complete technical documentation.

research.title: Academic Research Project

Sociological Study - Transversal Skills Development
University research project demonstrating my skills in methodology, critical analysis and technical writing. Complete project management: planning, documentary research, data analysis, professional presentation. Concrete example of intellectual rigor and ability to handle complex subjects.
